text:
Friendly reminder as most of you are getting the v1.03 update which adds the new developer menu, major dark theme updates, Spanish Language Support, Community links, security/permissions improvements. Please rate and review the extension, rating increases it’s visibility. It’s free, open source, and for many of us, it affects our daily work life. The more visibility it gets the more contributors, and the more the existing contributors are inspired/energized to keep improving it.
<https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/HubSpot-developer-extensi/gebemkdecnlgbcanplbgdpcffpdnfdfo>
This is literally epic, and should be in the nav as part of a "developer" permission/role set
Another link to add to dev menu possibly, the URL Mappings tool

I think it’s worth adding as well. I’m not really in there super often but I see the value.

The links I tried to organize based on frequency of how often devs go into those things. Personally I think URL Mappings should maybe go below content settings.

Feel free to weigh in if you agree/disagree. I have no actual stats I’m basing it on, only my own experience
